other_tests.findings: Characteristic elastic fiber changes featuring a considerable accumulation of clumped fibers in the mid dermis that stained black with von Kossa stain.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Over the last 2 years, the patient has developed similar skin changes in the axillary, inguinal, popliteal, and antecubital folds and mild laxity of most affected sites.

other_tests.findings: Swollen and irregularly clumped elastic fibers in the mid dermis with von Kossa staining showing presence of calcium deposits within the fibers.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Funduscopic examination results were normal at the time of diagnosis and remain so 8 years post-transplantation.

other_tests.findings: Characteristic dermal elastic tissue changes of PXE on Verhoeff-vanGieson stain and von Kossa stain showed calcification of the dystrophic elastic fibers.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Examination of the skin in 2009 showed no clinical signs of progression.
